subject: Re: Order #SSN3958 confirmed
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi James McKnight,  Could you please take a photo for us to confirm? Did you order the handbrake but receive the ProX Ultra pedals instead?

Hi James McKnight,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have already sent you a replacement. Please keep this pedal and return it to our Australian warehouse (coming soon) when the time comes.    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047173208078
